name: Deluxe Room
description: A luxurious room with a king-sized bed, ensuite bathroom, and a beautiful view.

name: Standard Room
description: A comfortable room with a queen-sized bed and all the basic amenities.

name: Suite
description: An elegant suite with a separate living area, king-sized bed, and premium amenities.

name: Family Room
description: A spacious room with two queen-sized beds, perfect for families.

name: Single Room
description: A cozy room with a single bed, ideal for solo travelers.

name: Twin Room
description: A room with two single beds, perfect for friends or colleagues.

name: Executive Room
description: A premium room with a king-sized bed, work desk, and executive amenities.

name: Presidential Suite
description: The most luxurious suite with a separate living area, dining area, and premium amenities.
